name: Ratchet & Clank
synopsis: Ratchet and Clank team up to save the world from the evil Drek: the leader of a dead planet who drains resources all over the universe.  As you progress from one alien planet to the next, you'll find or purchase over 36 weapons and gadgets including: a wrench, bomb glove, grappling hook, cannon, machine gun and a rocket launcher.  Think about it: you can choose from burning, bombing, exploding or obliterating your enemies.  So go ahead and blow it all up!
